## About the Author

My name is **Yolanda Liu Xingyan**, a Year Two Communications and New Media student studying at the National University of Singapore.

## Purpose of the Website

The purpose of this website is to provide resources, tutorials, and examples to help you harness the full potential of Quarto for your document creation needs. Whether you are a researcher, educator, student, or professional, I hope you find valuable information here to enhance your workflow and productivity.
